item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 25, 2025 at 3:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. VGGT: Visual Geometry Grounded Transformer (41 points | 14 comments)
2. Borne Back Ceaselessly into the Past: Fitzgerald, Gatsby and WWI (4 points | discuss)
3. Polypane, The browser for ambitious web developers (39 points | 26 comments)
4. Hann: A Fast Approximate Nearest Neighbor Search Library for Go (30 points | 5 comments)
5. My Favorite C++ Pattern: X Macros (2023) (5 points | 3 comments)
6. German parliament votes as a Git contribution graph (508 points | 140 comments)
7. Writing your own C++ standard library from scratch (111 points | 81 comments)
8. What Killed Innovation? (9 points | 2 comments)
9. If you get the chance, always run more extra network fiber cabling (39 points | 14 comments)
10. Search My Site – open-source search engine for personal and independent websites (184 points | 44 comments)
11. Samsung CEO Jong-hee Han has died (148 points | 69 comments)
12. Closing the Chapter on OpenH264 (46 points | 26 comments)
13. Reflecting on WikiTok (100 points | 23 comments)
14. A study reveals that deciduous trees' roots remain active in winter (37 points | 12 comments)
15. OpenID Coming to SSH (51 points | 24 comments)
16. Spammers are better at SPF, DKIM, and DMARC than everyone else (256 points | 132 comments)
17. Qwen2.5-VL-32B: Smarter and Lighter (505 points | 262 comments)
18. The Lost Towers of the Guelph-Ghibelline Wars (74 points | 25 comments)
19. Status as a Service (2019) (60 points | 27 comments)
20. The Practical Limitations of End-to-End Encryption (13 points | 3 comments)
21. Beej's Guide to C Programming [pdf] (42 points | 6 comments)
22. Three Hundred Years Later, a Tool from Isaac Newton Gets an Update (129 points | 34 comments)
23. The Hartlib Papers (11 points | discuss)
24. WWI's 'Dazzle' Camouflage Seemed Effective Due to Unexpected Optical Trick (98 points | 58 comments)
25. Coding Isn't Programming (126 points | 124 comments)
26. The Great Barefoot Running Hysteria of 2010 (136 points | 138 comments)
27. Brain Scans of Infants Reveal the Moment We Start Making Memories (91 points | 46 comments)
28. We chose LangGraph to build our coding agent (53 points | 13 comments)
29. CO2 laser enables long-range detection of radioactive material (101 points | 19 comments)
30. Battling the Blaze: Artifacts from the history of firefighting (12 points | 2 comments)
